reviews.text: We spent three delightful days at Dar Jnan Tiouira in October this year, and now just want to go back. Fruit of the vision and 10-year building effort of Mostapha Hamdoui and his family, this kasbah is built in traditional style with personal ingenuity in the beautiful Dades Gorge area. The rooms are decorated with taste and the terrasses offer a stunning view of the green valley and the surrounding mountains. The heart of the kasbah is an inner courtyard where the most delicious food is served to the lucky guests and many friendly conversations take place with the Hamdaoui brothers and sisters.
reviews.title: Beautiful kasbah, stunning surroundings, warm hospitality

reviews.text: It is truly a place to be happy and relax.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What made it unforgettable for us were, however, our hosts:
reviews.title: A Jewel in Gorges du Dades

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Mostapha who spoke with passion about the creation of Djnan Tiouira, the hammam he is planning to add, the tours he organises and the attraction of walking in the desert and in the mountains,
reviews.title: Truly a house of miracles

reviews.text: - Abdullah, who looked after us in the Kasbah and guided our treks through the surrounding valley, mountains and gorges, generously sharing information on Berber culture and his passion for the Atlas,
reviews.title: I never write reviews, but this hotel deserves it
